entry.title: Electric Adjustable Metal King Bed Frame
entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type:
Price: 1679.00

Description

  • Simple and easy to use wireless remote
  • Electric motor for easy head and foot adjustments
  • Metal frame for durability
  • Foam cover for added comfort
  • Fits most king size foam, hybrid or latex mattresses
  • Compatible with most foam mattresses up to 12" thick
  • Heavy duty steel construction, support up to 750 lbs
  • Mattress sold separately
  • Easy assembly

Enjoy a relaxing morning in bed with our electric adjustable bed frame. Equipped with a powerful motor, it can easily control the height of the head and foot, giving you limitless sleeping positions. With heavy-duty steel construction that provides support, it can alleviate body and joint pains. The bed frame is wrapped in a soft breathable cover and can be adjusted by the click of a button for the perfect angle for an evening read, movie night, or just a peaceful night's sleep.

Specifications

Assembly Required Yes
Product Dimensions 20"H X 75"W X 80"D
Product Weight 177 lbs.
Carton Shipping Dimensions 8"H X 78"W X 43"D
Carton Shipping Weight 143 lbs.
Materials Metal, Wood, Fabric, Foam
Max Weight 796 lbs.

entry.title: Adjustable Queen or King Metal Bed Frame
entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type:
Price: 149.00

Description

  • Easily adjusts to fit queen or king mattress
  • Center stability bar provides extra support
  • Six rug castors with safety brake for easy mobility
  • Fits queen or king headboards
  • Durable heavy duty steel construction
  • Angle steel 40x40x3mm
  • Box spring or wood platform required (not included)
  • Easy to assemble

This universal bed frame from CorLiving is the perfect choice for a good nights rest. This adjustable frame will accommodate queen or king sized box spring, mattress and headboard. A practical solution for any bed, it's designed to be used with a box spring mattress or a wood platform. The heavy duty durable steel frame features six legs with locking rug rollers and a center support making it easy to move your bed for cleaning or fasten in place to prevent further movement.

Specifications

Assembly Required Yes
Product Dimensions 10"H X 60"W X 70"D
Product Weight 31 lbs.

Max Weight 798 lbs.

entry.title: Ready-to-Assemble King Box Spring
entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type:
Price: 374.00

Description

  • Ready-to-Assemble foundation for easy transportation and storage
  • Fits a standard king size mattress
  • 100% polyester cover with zipper closure
  • Sturdy steel frame with 10 slats for added support
  • Non-slip foundation

A sturdy RTA mattress foundation for a restful nights sleep at a value added price! This box spring foundation technology is designed to extend the life of your mattress while evenly distributing weight, and providing support and stability that reduces mattress movement. The complete frame is wrapped in a woven polyester fabric cover. While easy to transport, this frame fits and stores in tight spaces and is ready-to-assemble in any bedroom space to suit your needs.

entry.title: 6" Queen Memory Foam Mattress - *CLEARANCE - Final Sale*
entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type:
Price: 559.00

Description

  • 2” temperature regulating memory foam
  • 4” stabilizing base foam
  • Light grey mesh for breathability and freshness
  • Non-slip zippered base for easy cleaning
  • Aloe vera infusion helps maintain freshness
  • Vacuum packed in small box for easy transport
  • Soft padded polyester cover
  • Fire-safe fabric liner
  • Anti-microbial
  • CertiPUR-US certification

Offering six unique layers of comfort, this mattress is a wise option for a restful night’s sleep at a value added price! Our CorLiving mattress technology features 2” of body contouring memory foam in the top layer. This comfortable memory foam layer hugs your body and relieves pressure points enhancing deeper sleep with less tossing and turning. The 4” base layer provides a denser foundation of support and stability that reduces mattress movement. The complete foam mattress is wrapped in a woven zippered Aloe Vera infused fabric cover, soft and subtle for your skin. When properly cared for, our mattresses are guaranteed to hold their shape bringing you sweet dreams that last for years.

Specifications

Assembly Required No
Product Dimensions 6"H X 60"W X 80"D
Product Weight 38 lbs.
Carton Shipping Dimensions 15"H X 61"W X 15"D
Carton Shipping Weight 44 lbs.
Materials Polyester, Mesh, Foam
Max Weight 0 lbs.
